name: RoundZ
description:
RoundZ - The Ultimate VR Zombie Shooter!


Get ready for an unforgettable VR experience in "RoundZ", a round-based zombie shooter. Battle against hordes of zombies, upgrade your weapons and face increasingly difficult rounds. But that's not all, the game also includes exciting features such as multiplayer, unique super weapons, and drivable vehicles. Join forces with other players and take on the zombie apocalypse together. Immerse yourself in the world of RoundZ and see if you have what it takes to survive.

Is this game for YOU?


Get ready for a heart-pounding adventure with fast-paced gameplay that challenges your skills. RoundZ starts slow and gets harder, but with smooth controls and a gradual difficulty curve, survival is within reach. Keep moving, stay sharp, and enjoy the thrill of victory in every moment.

RoundZ features:

  • A tutorial to try out the different functionalities in peace
  • Can be played over and over again
  • Host based multiplayer
  • Ragdoll physics

BEFORE YOU BUY

When played in VR, the Game officially supports Oculus Quest and Rift S VR headsets. HTC Vive and Valve Index support will follow soon.
